solution_line_template: The dinner cost {total_dinner_cost} dollars because {num_kids} x {dinner_cost_per_kid} = <<{num_kids}*{dinner_cost_per_kid}={total_dinner_cost}>>{total_dinner_cost}

The kids earned {total_money_earned} in total because {total_dinner_cost} x {money_spent_fraction_denominator} = <<{total_dinner_cost}*{money_spent_fraction_denominator}={total_money_earned}>>{total_money_earned}
They planted {total_rows_planted} rows of corn because {total_money_earned} / {pay_per_row} = <<{total_money_earned}/{pay_per_row}={total_rows_planted}>>{total_rows_planted}
They planted {total_ears_planted} ears of corn in total because {total_rows_planted} x {ears_per_row} = <<{total_rows_planted}*{ears_per_row}={total_ears_planted}>>{total_ears_planted}
They each planted {ears_per_kid} ears of corn because {total_ears_planted} / {num_kids} = <<{total_ears_planted}/{num_kids}={ears_per_kid}>>{ears_per_kid}
They each planted {seeds_per_kid} seeds because {ears_per_kid} x {seeds_per_ear} = <<{ears_per_kid}*{seeds_per_ear}={seeds_per_kid}>>{seeds_per_kid}
They each used {bags_per_kid} bags of seeds because {seeds_per_kid} / {seeds_per_bag} = <<{seeds_per_kid}/{seeds_per_bag}={bags_per_kid}>>{bags_per_kid}
